dialogs.name: Glass
dialogs.text: Why do you have the keycard with you?

dialogs.name: Bean
dialogs.text: It wasn't with me. The keycard was here all along.

dialogs.name: Glass
dialogs.text: How did find the way here?

dialogs.name: Glass
dialogs.text: Do you have any other keycards on you?

dialogs.name: Bean
dialogs.text: No, I didn't have any keycard.

dialogs.name: Bean
dialogs.text: I was just trying to hide from them. I came here from there.

dialogs.name: Glass
dialogs.text: That's the way I came from.

dialogs.name: Bean
dialogs.text: I know the door opens when it finds keycard. But the door was already opened for me.
